snippet: President Obama unloaded on a number of American allies: Britain, France, Turkey, Saudi Arabia, and other Persian Gulf countries.
abstract: White House officials walk back comments made by Pres Obama about Great Britain and Prime Min David Cameron in widely read magazine interview in The Atlantic; comments came amid other criticisms of allies.
lead_paragraph: President Obama unloaded on a number of American allies: Britain, France, Turkey, Saudi Arabia, and other Persian Gulf countries.

headline.main: White House Backs Off From Obama’s Critique of Cameron
headline.print_headline: White House Backs Off From Critique of Cameron
